txt.en: The memorial is now complete. It looks like Belondor wants to talk to you.
'How generous of them to pay for a memorial! Yes, I would love to go and see it.'
A Man Adrift, Part 6: In Remembrance
Talk to Mêshka
Mêshka has asked you to visit each of the surviving family members of the crew of the Rebuke and invite them to the memorial she arranged.
TBD Thanks for the invite
Everything for the memorial has been prepared. You should talk to Mêshka when you are ready to attend.

'I don't know what this is about, but now I grow suspicious. Mêshka says she would like to meet with you again at the Fleet-watch Tavern. Off with you, before I decide to have you followed,' he says with a wink.
Talk to Belondor in Dâr Laja
Talk to Ansham, Talkênza's wife
Talk to Mêshka at the Fleet-watch Tavern
Talk to Bekhír, Khalmôz's son
'I don't know what this is about, but now I grow suspicious.'
'This is not how I expected today to go, my friend.'
Mêshka has requested your help again at the Fleet-watch Tavern at the south end of the Fleet-fast.
You have invited the families of the slain crew members of the Rebuke. You should return to Mêshka at the Fleet-watch Tavern.
OBJ Descript
'A memorial? You know, I think that would be very nice. Yes, you can count on me to be there.'
TBD Thanks for the invite

'I suppose I should sober up then, eh?'

She laughs without joy.

'Yes, I will attend.'
'Everyone has been invited? It seems we are all ready then. Talk to me again when you are ready to go.'
Talk to Okhâb, Hâkraph's brother
' I am glad you made it!'
'Everyone has been invited? It seems we are all ready then.'
Talk to Pârnakh, Mairan's mother
Talk to Imâra, Sallax's wife
Meet with Mêshka at the Fleet-watch Tavern.
'Are you ready? Let us get this over with.'
Talk to Mêshka at the Fleet-watch Tavern

'[placeholder], I am glad you made it! The memorial is almost ready to go. The last bit of business that needs to be tended to is the invitations. Here is a list of surviving family members of the crew that reside in the city. Please pay each of them a visit and invite them to the memorial. In the meantime I will see to the finishing touches and collect Belondor. Return to me here when you are ready.'

'This is not how I expected today to go, my friend.'

Belondor forces a small smile, and looks you in the eye.

'I will meet with the Order of the Eagle, and see what they have to offer.'
'I will do anything for Belondor and Mêshka. Allow me to go get cleaned up, and I will be there.'
'A memorial? How thoughtful. Of course, I will be there.'
